prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Reed, Brass, Piano, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Reed, Brass, but no Guitar, with a Bass line.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Bass, Reed, Brass, and Piano, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
No Guitar is included in this song, but it does have Piano, Drums, Reed, Brass, and a Bass line.
